title: Cinelli Melcher Oosterman “Better Together” Collection
content:
Cinelli just unveiled the first release of its 2025 Artist Collaboration Series: a collaboration with artist Melcher Oosterman. This capsule collection created with the Dutch designed is titled “Better Together,” and features a t-shirt and cycling cap that celebrate an unforgettable chapter in Olympic and Cinelli history — the 1960 Rome tandem gold medal victory.

Check it out at Cinelli.

The post Cinelli Melcher Oosterman “Better Together” Collection appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
